long_description:
Inputs
------
default: OrderedPair | Vector
    The voltages to send to the Keithley 2400 source meter.
short_description: The IV_SWEEP node takes an I-V curve measurement with a Keithley 2400 source meter, send voltages, and measures currents.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The open connection with the Keithley2400 source meter.
